name: Shatter
summary: Shatter is a video game developed and published by Sidhe Interactive for the PlayStation 3 via the PlayStation Store on July 23, 2009. Shatter is a re-imagining of the classic block-breaking Arkanoid gameplay mechanic, with the addition of physics forces "suck" and "blow" to give the player control of the ball and other physics-enabled objects.
